dcterms:creator: J. J. Pfeiffer III
J. Neville
P. N. Bennett
dcterms:description: In the Facebook dataset, the nodes are Facebook users and the task is to predict the political views of a user given the gender and religious view of the user as features.
dcterms:title: Facebook (FB)

dcterms:creator: X. Wang
L. Tang
H. Gao
H. Liu
dcterms:description: In the BlogCatalog dataset, the nodes are users of a social blog directory, the user’s blog tags are treated as node features and edges correspond to friendship or fan following. The task here is to predict the interests of users.
dcterms:title: BlogCatalog (BLOG)

dcterms:creator: W. L. Hamilton
Z. Ying
J. Leskovec
dcterms:description: In Reddit, the nodes are the Reddit posts, the features are the averaged glove embeddings of text content in the post and edges are created between posts if the same users comment on both. The task here is to predict the sub-Reddit community to which the post belongs.
dcterms:title: Reddit

dcterms:creator: Q. Lu
L. Getoor
dcterms:description: Cora dataset consists of articles as nodes and edges denote citations. The bag-of-word representation of the article is used as node attributes. The task is to predict the research area of the article.
dcterms:title: Cora

dcterms:creator: I. Bhattacharya
L. Getoor
dcterms:description: Citeseer dataset consists of articles as nodes and edges denote citations. The bag-of-word representation of the article is used as node attributes. The task is to predict the research area of the article.
dcterms:title: Citeseer

dcterms:creator: A. Mccallum
dcterms:description: Cora2 is a multi-label classification dataset consisting of research papers. The task is to predict multiple research areas for each paper.
dcterms:title: Cora2

dcterms:creator: G. Namata
B. London
L. Getoor
B. Huang
U. EDU
dcterms:description: Pubmed dataset consists of articles as nodes and edges denote citations. The bag-of-word representation of the article is used as node attributes. The task is to predict the research area of the article.
dcterms:title: Pubmed

dcterms:creator: H. Hatzis
D. Page
dcterms:description: Yeast dataset is part of the KDD cup 2001 challenge which contains interactions between proteins. The task is to predict the function of these genes.
dcterms:title: Yeast

dcterms:creator: W. L. Hamilton
Z. Ying
J. Leskovec
dcterms:description: Human dataset is a protein-protein interaction (PPI) network from Human Tissues. The dataset contains PPI from 24 human tissues and the task is to predict the gene’s functional ontology.
dcterms:title: Human

dcterms:creator: J. Leskovec
R. Sosiˇc
dcterms:description: Amazon dataset is a co-purchase network where nodes correspond to DVDs and edges are constructed if two DVDs are co-purchased. The DVD genres are treated as DVD features.
dcterms:title: Amazon

dcterms:creator: I. Cantador
P. Brusilovsky
T. Kuﬂik
dcterms:description: Movie dataset is constructed from Movielens-2k dataset. The nodes are the movies and edges are created between movies if they share a common actor or director. The task here is to predict all possible genres of the movies.
dcterms:title: Movie
